category.name: Rich Client
category.category_description: No description available for this category.

preference.name: search_automatic_wildcard
preference.preference_description: To enhance local metadata searches, automatically adds the asterisk (*) character as a prefix, suffix, or both for search criteria for all string attributes. This feature is available in all Teamcenter clients. Valid values are 0 - Search criteria are not altered. 1 - The asterisk (*) character is added as a suffix. 2 - The asterisk (*) character is added as a prefix. 3 - The asterisk (*) character is added as both a suffix and a prefix.
